In recent days, Hamas terrorists have fired hundreds of rockets at Israel's civilians. › >
> No other country lives under such a threat. Israel will not tolerate the firing of rockets on our cities and towns.>
> We have therefore significantly expanded our operations against Hamas and the other terrorist organizations in Gaza.>
> This comes after our repeated efforts to restore calm were met with increased Hamas rocket fire.>
> Israel is not eager for war but the security of our citizens is our primary consideration.>
> Israel targets Hamas terrorists. By contrast Hamas targets innocent Isareli civilians civilians while hiding behind civilians.>
> We are determined to give our citizens the safety and security they deserve. "#ProtectiveEdge

»The operation will be expanded and will continue until the firing stops at our communities and quiet is restored.
